ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] EBAY "Ripped Me Off"
ygData.msgSnippet: Holy Crud, Bev. Did you sign up for a feature or anything like that? Have you asked for an itemized statement for what they say you owe? No wonder Ebay makes
ygData.messageBody:
Holy Crud, Bev. Did you sign up for a feature or anything like that?
Have you asked for an itemized statement for what they say you owe?



No wonder Ebay makes to much money. I list "ONE" item for sell
thinking the price they say it is $15 and change and I get a bill for
("Non-Payment of $132.86 Balance on your eBay account"). These people
go ripping other people off. I will never use their service again and
I would hope other people don't end up in my situation! Sorry for
venting but this is complete BS.

._.~*~._.~*~.Beverly R._.~*~._.~*






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
